snippet: The soldiers, deployed to guard an oil pipeline, were beheaded, shot or hanged by members of the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria.
abstract: Members of Islamic State of Iraq and Syria, or ISIS, attack army unit in Mosul, Iraq, killing 15 soldiers; attack underscores extremist group's move beyond Anbar Province into territory throughout Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The soldiers, deployed to guard an oil pipeline, were beheaded, shot or hanged by members of the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria.

headline.main: Islamic Extremists Slaughter 15 Soldiers in Northern Iraqi City

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
